attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that me and my family could stay up to date with president trump and his campaign but ever since my phone has been glitching and I have viruses. I do not recommend this app whatsoever. Because of this app my family and I will be revoking our support for Donald Trump. Disappointed is an understatement.
attributes.title: A monstrosity of an app!

attributes.review: This app is spreading false information, and discriminating a vast majority of citizens. I have never experienced such disgusting hatred. The app itself is hideous. No words can describe the nastiness of its layout. Many of the links and buttons dont work however it does represent the president well. He doesnâ€™t to anything for this country.

attributes.review: i would give this 0 stars if i could. everything on the app was horrid and the worst thing about it was that once you open it , it shows donald's face. it scared the crap out of me ! but i signed in and right when i did i got like 3 viruses. i love my president and wanted to support him but there's not much to support about a cheeto.
attributes.title: DO NOT get this app

attributes.review: Much like other users I found that this app did not live up to my expectations. I was very disappointed by the number of notifications that I already receive millions of via the mailing list. I am very upset and hope that iTunes will do something to take this app down.

attributes.review: I opened the app and it immediately crashed on me also in an add it said that it would pay pal you 10$ and guess what it never did also this app was cursed the day I got it my dog died and I hit a bird with my car also a dropped and cracked my phone This app is not worth taking up space in your phone.

BUT THEN when I stated to wash the dishes instead of water, FIRE came out. So I deleted the app and everything got better. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
